trans-unit.source: Contains the data sent to a tracking service by the runtime tracking infrastructure when an <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint" /> is matched.
trans-unit.target: 包含在符合 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint" /> 時，由執行階段追蹤基礎結構傳送至追蹤服務的資料。

trans-unit.source: It is also used in the return list of the <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.ActivityEvents" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 這也使用於 <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.ActivityEvents" /> 屬性的傳回清單中。

trans-unit.source: When the runtime tracking infrastructure matches an <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint> in a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>, it sends an <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord> to the tracking service over the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingChannel> associated with that tracking service.
trans-unit.target: 當執行階段追蹤基礎結構符合 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint> 中的 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> 時，它會透過與追蹤服務關聯的 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord> 將 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingChannel> 傳送至該追蹤服務。

trans-unit.source: The tracking service can perform whatever action is needed on the data in the tracking record.
trans-unit.target: 追蹤服務可以在追蹤記錄中的資料上執行所需的任何動作。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The constructor is called by the runtime tracking infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: 執行階段追蹤基礎結構會呼叫這個建構函式。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called by the runtime tracking infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: 執行階段追蹤基礎結構會呼叫這個建構函式。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the activity associated with the activity status event.
trans-unit.target: 與活動狀態事件關聯之活動的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.QualifiedName" /> of the activity associated with the activity status event.
trans-unit.target: 與活動狀態事件關聯之活動的 <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.QualifiedName" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> that identifies the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext" /> of the activity associated with the activity status event.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Guid" />，它會識別與活動狀態事件關聯之活動的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> that identifies the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext" /> of the parent activity of the activity associated with the activity status event.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Guid" />，它會識別與活動狀態事件關聯的活動之父活動的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext" />。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> that indicates the date and time of the activity status event associated with the tracking record.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />，表示與追蹤記錄關聯之活動狀態事件的日期和時間。

trans-unit.source: The relative order in which the activity status event associated with this tracking record occurred in the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: 與此追蹤記錄關聯的活動狀態事件在工作流程執行個體中的相對順序。

trans-unit.source: A null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 <see langword="Nothing" />)。

trans-unit.source: This field is not set for an <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord" />.
trans-unit.target: 不會為 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord" /> 設定這個欄位。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord" /> class by using the specified parameters.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的參數初始化 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the common language runtime (CLR) type of the activity associated with this <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定與此 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord" /> 關聯之活動的 Common Language Runtime (CLR) 類型。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the activity for which this <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord" /> was created.
trans-unit.target: 建立此 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 所針對的活動的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord" />。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord.ActivityType%2A> is set by the runtime tracking infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord.ActivityType%2A> 由執行階段追蹤基礎結構設定。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of annotations associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint" /> that was matched.
trans-unit.target: 取得與符合的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint" /> 關聯的附註集合。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingAnnotationCollection" /> that contains the annotations that are associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint" /> that corresponds to this tracking record.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingAnnotationCollection" />，其中包含與對應此追蹤記錄之 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint" /> 關聯的附註。

trans-unit.source: This property is set by the runtime tracking infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是由執行階段追蹤基礎結構所設定。

trans-unit.source: Gets a list that contains any data extracted from the workflow for the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint" /> that was matched.
trans-unit.target: 取得包含擷取資料的清單，這些資料是從符合的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint" /> 的工作流程中擷取。

trans-unit.source: A list of <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItem" /> objects each of which contains a single piece of extracted data and its associated annotations.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItem" /> 物件的清單，其中的每一個物件都包含一段擷取資料和相關附註。

trans-unit.source: When an <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint> is matched, the runtime tracking infrastructure can extract data from the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: 符合 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint> 時，執行階段追蹤基礎結構可以從工作流程執行個體中擷取資料。

trans-unit.source: The data to be extracted is specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.Extracts%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 由 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.Extracts%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 指定要擷取的資料。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.Extracts%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> can contain two kinds of objects: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityDataTrackingExtract> objects specify member data to be extracted from the activity associated with the activity status event; and, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowDataTrackingExtract> objects specify member data to be extracted from the root activity of the workflow.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.Extracts%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 可包含兩種物件：<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityDataTrackingExtract> 物件指定要從與活動狀態事件關聯的活動中擷取的成員資料，而 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowDataTrackingExtract> 物件指定要從工作流程的根活動中擷取的成員資料。

trans-unit.source: Both of these extract types can also specify annotations to be returned with the extracted data.
trans-unit.target: 這兩種擷取類型都可以指定要隨擷取的資料傳回的附註。

trans-unit.source: The runtime tracking infrastructure encapsulates each piece of extracted data and its associated annotations in a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItem>, and adds this <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItem> to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord.Body%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 執行階段追蹤基礎結構會在 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItem> 中封裝每段擷取資料和關聯附註，並將此 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItem> 加入至 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord.Body%2A>。

trans-unit.source: This property is set by the runtime tracking infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是由執行階段追蹤基礎結構所設定。

trans-unit.source: Context of the activity.
trans-unit.target: 活動的內容。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> that identifies the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext" /> of the activity associated with the activity status event.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Guid" />，識別與活動狀態事件關聯之活動的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext" />。

trans-unit.source: Always <see langword="null" /> for an <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord" />.
trans-unit.target: 對於 <see langword="null" /> 永遠都是 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord" />。

trans-unit.source: A null reference (<see langword="Nothing" />) for an <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Nothing" /> 的 null 參考 (<see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord" />)。

trans-unit.source: This property is set by the runtime tracking infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是由執行階段追蹤基礎結構所設定。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord.EventArgs%2A> has no meaning for an <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord> and is always a null reference (`Nothing`).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord.EventArgs%2A> 對 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord> 沒有任何意義，而且永遠是 null 參考 (`Nothing`)。

trans-unit.source: This property is set by the runtime tracking infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是由執行階段追蹤基礎結構所設定。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the date and time that the activity status event occurred.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定活動狀態事件發生的日期和時間。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTime> is Greenwich Mean Time (UTC).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime> 是格林威治標準時間 (UTC)。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord.EventDateTime%2A> is set by the runtime tracking infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord.EventDateTime%2A> 由執行階段追蹤基礎結構設定。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates the order in the workflow instance of the activity status event that matched the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，該值表示符合 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint" /> 的活動狀態事件在工作流程執行個體中的順序。

trans-unit.source: A value that indicates the order of the activity status event in the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: 表示活動狀態事件在工作流程執行個體中的順序的值。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord.EventOrder%2A> indicates the relative order of the event that matched the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint> within the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord.EventOrder%2A> 表示符合工作流程執行個體內 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint> 之事件的相對順序。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord.EventOrder%2A> is unique within a workflow instance, but it is not guaranteed to be sequential.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord.EventOrder%2A> 在工作流程執行個體中是唯一的，但不保證循序。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord.EventOrder%2A> is set by the runtime tracking infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord.EventOrder%2A> 由執行階段追蹤基礎結構設定。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the execution status of the activity associated with this <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定與此 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord" /> 關聯之活動的執行狀態。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: A workflow instance only emits activity status events when the execution status of an activity instance changes.
trans-unit.target: 只有在活動執行個體的執行狀態變更時，工作流程執行個體才會發出活動狀態事件。

trans-unit.source: Therefore an <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint> can only be matched when an activity execution status change occurs.
trans-unit.target: 因此，只能在發生活動執行狀態變更時比對 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord.ExecutionStatus%2A> contains the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus?displayProperty=nameWithType> that triggered the match and caused the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord> to be sent.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord.ExecutionStatus%2A> 包含觸發比對並使 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus?displayProperty=nameWithType> 傳送的 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord>。

trans-unit.source: It reflects the current status of the activity instance.
trans-unit.target: 它反映出活動執行個體的目前狀態。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord.ExecutionStatus%2A> is set by the runtime tracking infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord.ExecutionStatus%2A> 由執行階段追蹤基礎結構設定。

trans-unit.source: Context of the parent activity.
trans-unit.target: 父活動的內容。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> that identifies the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext" /> of the activity associated with the activity status event.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Guid" />，識別與活動狀態事件關聯之活動的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the identifier of the activity associated with this <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定與此 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord" /> 關聯之活動的識別項。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.QualifiedName" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> for which this tracking record was created.
trans-unit.target: 建立此追蹤記錄所針對的 <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.QualifiedName" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord.QualifiedName%2A> is set by the runtime tracking infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord.QualifiedName%2A> 由執行階段追蹤基礎結構設定。
